Description: Enable brownfield mode to include existing capacities from a base year. When enabled, the model considers existing infrastructure and only allows expansion from that baseline.
Reference year for existing capacities in brownfield mode. Typically set to 2020 or the most recent year with complete data.
Intervals to group existing capacities for power
Intervals to group existing capacities for heat
Capacities generators and links of below threshold are removed during add_existing_capacities

Values: Any subset of {uranium, coal, lignite, oil}
Description: List of conventional power plants to include in the sectoral network
